snippet: Dario Cecchini, the lively butcher-intellectual of Panzano in Chianti, might be onto something: rejecting the fluidity of the modern world, choosing to focus on his craft, and putting down roots in his Tuscan village as a way to be from somewhere...
abstract: Dario Cecchini, the lively butcher-intellectual of Panzano in Chianti, might be onto something: rejecting the fluidity of the modern world, choosing to focus on his craft, and putting down roots in his Tuscan village as a way to be from somewhere rather than everywhere.

headline.main: Coming Together (Not Apart) in a Tuscan Village
